SELECT bs.SL_CODE AS slCode, bs.HOUSE_CODE AS houseCode, bs.BUYER_ID AS buyerId, bs.START_TIME AS startTime, bs.END_TIME AS endTime, bs.APPLY_SIDE AS applySide, ifnull(bs.APPLY_STATUS,'') AS applyStatus, bs.APPLY_TIME AS applyTime, '0' AS flag, ifnull(house.HOUSE_SHOW_NAME,'')AS houseShowName
FROM sl_bs_buyer bs INNER JOIN sl_house_account house on bs.HOUSE_CODE = house.HOUSE_CODE and bs.SL_CODE = house.SL_CODE and (house.DEL_FLG =0 OR house.DEL_FLG IS NULL ) WHERE (bs.DEL_FLG = 0 OR bs.DEL_FLG IS NULL )
and bs.BUYER_ID in
#{buyerId}
Union All SELECT his.SL_CODE AS slCode, his.HOUSE_CODE AS houseCode, his.BUYER_ID AS buyerId, his.START_TIME AS startTime, his.END_TIME AS endTime, his.APPLY_SIDE AS applySide, ifnull(his.APPLY_STATUS,'') AS applyStatus, his.APPLY_TIME AS applyTime, '1' AS flag, ifnull(house.HOUSE_SHOW_NAME,'') AS houseShowName FROM sl_bs_buyer_his his INNER JOIN sl_house_account house on his.HOUSE_CODE = house.HOUSE_CODE and his.SL_CODE = house.SL_CODE and (house.DEL_FLG =0 OR house.DEL_FLG IS NULL ) where (his.DEL_FLG = 0 OR his.DEL_FLG IS NULL )
and his.BUYER_ID in
#{buyerId}
ORDER BY buyerId,startTime
